Package xxl.core.util.concurrency

This packages contain classes dealing with concurrency programming (multi threaded programming), for example semaphores and channels.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Channel
    Implements a channel by using semaphores.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AsynchronousChannel
    Implements a channel by using semaphores.
    AsynchronousNChannel
    Implements a channel with n elements by using semaphores and a one element channel.
    MutableBoolean
    This class is useful if threads are accessing a common variable (or for simulating reference parameters in methods).
    MutableInt
    This class is useful if threads are accessing a common variable (or for simulating reference parameters in methods).
    MutableObject
    This class is useful if threads are accessing a common variable (or for simulating reference parameters in methods).
    Semaphore
    Implements a Semaphore by using synchronized blocks.

Package xxl.core.util.concurrency Description

This packages contain classes dealing with concurrency programming (multi threaded programming), for example semaphores and channels.
